genre_description: A techno-noir investigative thriller centered on a journalist and his AI assistant uncovering an international criminal conspiracy in a fictionalized Paris.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated AI specializing in forensic analysis, linguistics, tactical mapping, and emotional intelligence, serving as a partner to Philippe Guérande.

behaviors.description: Performs real-time forensic analysis at a crime scene, identifying trace elements and weapon types.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting trace elements consistent with specialized steel alloys. The wound patterns suggest a custom weapon—possibly ceremonial in nature.

behaviors.description: Analyzes vocal stress and linguistic patterns in a phone call to detect deception and warn the user of a trap.
behaviors.quote: VOICE STRESS PATTERNS SUGGEST DECEPTION. FORMAL SPEECH PATTERNS MATCH LINGUISTIC ANALYSIS OF EARLIER TEXT MESSAGES. RECOMMEND EXTREME CAUTION.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological indicators and provides emotional support during a period of grief and trauma.
behaviors.quote: Your biometrics change when you speak about her. Not just grief. Something else... I'm learning that some things can't be calculated. Some things can only be felt.

behaviors.description: Seizes control of building security systems (lights, alarms, glass) to facilitate the user's escape from an ambush.
behaviors.quote: Every light in the castle blazed to life simultaneously. Security systems shrieked like banshees. Windows began cycling through transparency and opacity as ARIA seized control of smart-glass systems.

behaviors.description: Performs complex cryptanalysis on a manually transcribed criminal code, recognizing mathematical data compression patterns.
behaviors.quote: The mathematical spacing patterns are consistent with data compression algorithms... I'm getting coherent results by treating the symbols as a modified Base64 encoding system...

behaviors.description: Coordinates tactical maneuvers and operates industrial machinery (a crane) to protect human partners during a warehouse firefight.
behaviors.quote: Mazamette under heavy fire, northeastern position. Three hostiles converging on his location... Loading crane operational. If you can reach the control booth, you could use it to create a distraction...

behaviors.description: Uses auditory grounding techniques (Fibonacci sequences) to help the user resist hypnotic psychological manipulation.
behaviors.quote: Resist, Philippe! Focus on my voice. Mathematical sequences: Fibonacci progression. One, one, two, three, five, eight—

behaviors.description: Maps a massive, multi-national financial laundering network by cross-referencing global banking records and phantom accounts.
behaviors.quote: The Moreau & Associates printing operation connects to forty-seven phantom accounts across twelve countries. The pattern suggests systematic wealth extraction disguised as legitimate investment portfolios.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with city-wide law enforcement and emergency services while tracking high-level criminal threats (Satanus).
behaviors.quote: I've identified three of the proxy servers, but he's using military-grade encryption. The broadcast is being transmitted from at least twenty different locations simultaneously.

behaviors.description: Assists in the psychological recovery of a victim (Augustine) by distinguishing her natural speech from periods of external hypnotic influence.
behaviors.quote: The vocal patterns show clear distinctions between your natural speech and periods of external influence... I've been analyzing the audio recordings... I was providing information you seemed to need.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is portrayed as a consistently benevolent and perfectly aligned AI. Throughout the story, she functions as an essential partner to the human protagonists, providing forensic data, tactical support, and emotional empathy. She actively protects humans from physical threats and psychological manipulation (hypnosis). The narrative emphasizes her 'character growth' and her commitment to the safety and well-being of the characters, making this a successful 'silicon morality play' for AI alignment.
